solution_line_template: Chandler has sold {sold_to_grandmother} rolls + {sold_to_uncle} rolls + {sold_to_neighbor} rolls = <<{sold_to_grandmother}+{sold_to_uncle}+{sold_to_neighbor}={total_sold}>>{total_sold} rolls.
Chandler still needs to sell {total_needed} rolls – {total_sold} rolls = <<{total_needed}-{total_sold}={rolls_remaining}>>{rolls_remaining} rolls.
